TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, hes a zombie and will eat your brain too

I wish i had a ZSU-23

Okay it just appeared about 100 feet above where you are currently sitting.

I wish I could speak fluent Korean.

Granted, but now you can only speak korean.

I wish I had an orion drive type spaceship.

Granted, but the radiation breaks the life support.

I wish for infinite chocolate.

Granted, it's bitter. Like, no sugar at all.

I wish to dominate FAR design

Granted, but only with craft weighing more than 5000T.

I wish I had more time to play KSP.

granted, its corrupted ksp

i wish the world ended

Granted.

I wish I could figure what the hell went wrong with my program... The code should have worked...

granted, but now something is wrong with your brain, maybe its a maggot, or 2...

i wish i had the vab menu in real life to build anything i want where i want

Granted but your playing on career mode and have to pay for everything you build.

I wish I had a powerful computer to play KSP 64bit with all the mods I wanted...

Granted, But it overheats and melts its eleet cores and computer stuff. Basically making it unplayable.

I wish I could unban myself from other websites that I will not name.

granted, but everyone else is banned, and you re alone

i wish i was an admin on steam

Granted, steam is now the most hated place on the internet.

I wish to make a wish that cannot be corrupted.

Granted. You are corrupted, instead. Sent to jail, you think about why you shouldn't have run for president.

I wish for a living, good, cheap lawyer who can win cases and get me money back.

Granted. It used to be a prosecuter, so it makes you look bad all the time. So bad, in fact, that you die of embarrassment.

I wish to be like Mark Whatney.

Granted, you must now spend your whole life with a misspelled surname.

I wish I could make actual social contact .

Granted: "take me to your leader"

I wish I could go have a nap.

Granted, But you are kidnapped.

I wish for a new graphics card

granted. it is a horrible graphics card that cannot run pac-man at 5fps

i wish for better steam

granted. it is a horrible graphics card that cannot run pac-man at 5fps

i wish for better steam

grantedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.melts ice

I wish this wish would not be corrupted.

granted: your wish stays as it is. You, however, failing to notice that your wish is too similar to SpaceplaneAddict's, are also sent to jail to ponder why you never ran for vice-president.

I wish I was president of the US for a day.

Granted, ISIS terrorists headshot you

i wish i had a ton of 999 gold

Granted, ISIS terrorists headshot you

i wish i had a ton of 999 gold

grantedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.fools gold

I wish Macey Dean would release his next video already

Granted, its a remix of justin bieber baby

i wish i had the ability to shape shift

Granted. It is only into a rock.

I wish I had a server rack
